short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Making JSON easier to read in the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rainbow JSON Viewer is a small and simple extension that makes it easier for you to read JSON in the browser.

🌈 Each level of JSON properties are a different colour to help with readability, creating a rainbow effect as you scroll
🌙 Automatic light and dark mode detection that uses your operating system's default
🪗 Show and Hide sections of JSON
🔗 Link support for external links and Open API schema reference links
📋 Copy button allows you to copy the raw JSON to your clipboard
⛔️ Add URLs to an ignore list to prevent the extension from running on those URLs
🩷 Free and open-source without ads
